hero.bottom: I'm a self-taught Full-Stack developer with extensive programming experience including Django, React and more.

desc.first: I am a Full-Stack Developer with over three years of professional experience, specializing in building robust back-end systems with Django and Python. I am currently expanding my expertise in modern front-end development using React and Vite.
desc.second: With a Computer Science degree and a background in diverse technical projects, I have progressed into a team leadership role, where I focus on guiding teams to deliver high-quality software. I am eager to contribute my technical and leadership skills to collaborative and challenging projects.

contact.title: Now what?
contact.txtdesk: Well, you can contact me through these social networks on the side.
